name: Sprinter Slayer
description:
Small prototype I made in ~16 hours in Unreal Engine for a school project.

Sprinter Slayer is a racing game about cowboy eggs riding velociraptors chasing a bone, the first one to reach the finish line with the bone in his mouth wins.

How to play
  • [W] accelerate
  • [A] turn left
  • [D] turn right
  • [R] restart game
  • Eating eggs gives you a speed boost
  • Get close to the bone to grab it or take it away from the other dinosaurs
  • Complete the two laps and reach the finish line with the bone to win
